subject: Re: Dual licensing
body:
2007/5/11, Francesco Poli <frx@firenze.linux.it>:
Hi!  :)Thanks for your reply :) What do you mean by "announcement clause"?]
Do you mean the Obnoxious Advertising Clause (OAC, hereinafter)?See[1] for more information about the OAC.[1] http://www.gnu.org/philosophy/bsd.html

Greetings and thanks,MiryPS: I'm not subscribed to the list, so please CC me in your answers
